channel.title: Visual Studio on 4wayhandshake
channel.description: Recent content in Visual Studio on 4wayhandshake

item.title: Compiled
item.description: INTRODUCTION I’d like to say I had a fun time with Compiled, but I really didn’t. It had several good learning moments, but also a lot of really painful and time-consuming steps. It was very much a “CVE box”. Recon was easy. The initial nmap scans tell us almost everything we need to know. Two HTTP services are found right away, and the default script scan shows the presence of a subdomain.
